thread.title: Rhett Thomas
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Rhett Thomas

author: Rhett Thomas
title: Rhett Thomas
text: Costa Rican Vacations has been a joy to work with while planning a honeymoon for my fianc√© and I. Leah Reeb has been tremendous and very timely in answering so many questions that I've had and made some really great recommendations on things to do during our trip to Costa Rica. We have not gone yet, we get married in 3 weeks and then will be taking off, but we are SO excited and look forward to a tremendous time. Thank you, Leah and CRV!
